name: SFE Consulting Ltd
goal:
Goal: to help clients to anticipate and respond to business and regulatory challenges through the development of robust regulatory strategy, pragmatic RegTech initiatives, sustainable operating models and FS policy responses.

Using experience gained in FS regulators, a law firm, Civil Service, regulated FS firms, Fintechs and tech firms - I analyse issues, evaluate options and engage the client (and their stakeholders) in developing solutions. The outcome can be firm or consumer focused - as was my remit for work with the Open Banking Implementation Entity.
interests: Banking and financial services, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
1) Use of technology generally in financial services (e.g. E03591 - High-Level Expert Group on Artificial Intelligence)

2) PSD2 implementation - relevant generally, but also specifically for my consumer-facing work with the UK Open Banking Implementation Entity and with Pay.UK

3) RegTech/ Fintech and related initiatives - e.g. Fintech Action Plan, adoption of Legal Entity Identifier, Global Financial Innovation Network (GFIN)
